member.name: DML_MAX_UNPOOLING_OPERATOR_DESC
member.summary: Inverts a max-pooling operation (see for details) by filling the output tensor OutputTensor with the values in the input tensor InputTensor, as obtained from a max-pooling operation, according to the index values provided in the IndicesTensor. The elements in the output tensor untouched by this process are left with zero values.

member.name: DML_MAX_UNPOOLING_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: An input tensor of Sizes{ Batch, Channel, Height, Width }. The tensor values are obtained from the values in the OutputTensor of a max-pooling operation.

member.name: DML_MAX_UNPOOLING_OPERATOR_DESC.IndicesTensor
member.summary: A tensor of indices to the output tensor OutputTensor for the values given in the input tensor InputTensor. These index values are zero-based, and treat the output tensor as a contiguous one-dimensional array. Both the InputTensor and IndicesTensor have the same tensor sizes. The tensor values are obtained from the OutputIndicesTensor of a max-pooling operation.

member.name: DML_MAX_UNPOOLING_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: An output tensor of the same number of dimensions as the input tensor.
